wikipedia_page.main: Peter Poellner is a professor of philosophy at the University of Warwick. is research interests include phenomenology, philosophy of value, philosophy of mind, Husserl, Nietzsche. According to Brian Leiter, he has challenged the view that libertarian views of free will and moral responsibility are central to Western religious, moral, and cultural traditions.
